---
title: "Lectionary.jl"
---

`Lectionary.jl` is a Julia package that coordinates the Gregorian civil calendar with a liturgical calendar year, and with the readings from the Revised Common Lectionary (RCL) for days in the liturgical year.

- learn [how the liturgical year and the RCL work](./concepts/) 
- try a [tutorial](./tutorials/) to start using the `Lectionary` package
- find [recipes](./guides/) for specific tasks
- see [reference material](./reference/)
